smesri.title: What is SME Sustainability Reporting Index (SMESRI)?
smesri.description: The SME Sustainability Reporting Index (SMESRI) is a social value initiative developed by Cognizant UK&I in collaboration with Birkbeck University. It provides small to medium-sized enterprises with accessible information on sustainability reporting and governance requirements for public sector contracts. Whether you're new to government contracts or looking to enhance your compliance knowledge, SMESRI serves as a comprehensive guide to fulfilling key sustainability obligations required in UK Government projects. Key topics covered include:

modules.title: Sustainability Module
modules.description: Understanding sustainability governance principles and the key terminology that underpins government schedules and carbon reduction requirements.

modules.title: Reporting Module
modules.description: Essential guidance for SMEs engaging in public sector work, including recommended software and platforms for effective sustainability reporting.
